questions: What type of data is expected for the "lastname" property?
What is an example of a valid "custom" property?
answer:
## Expected properties.
!!! Tip 

    All properties are optional. If any property is missing it will not be processed and no error will be reported.

| Name      | Expected type   | Example                                           |
|-----------|-----------------|---------------------------------------------------|
| lastname  | string          | "John" |
| firstname | string          | "Doe" |
| email     | string          |"johndoe@example.com"     |
| login     | string          | "johndoe@example.com"    |
| custom    | object          | Any additional data like: plan, tier, etc. {"plan": "premium"}   |
